name: itemDropped
description: Emitted when an item has been dropped onto a row.

name: itemDragged
description: Emitted when an item has been dragged onto a row.

name: theadClicked
description: Emitted when a table header has been clicked.

name: highlight
description: Emitted when a table row has been clicked.

name: rowMounted
description: Emitted when a table row has been mounted.
type: (e: 'rowMounted', item: Item, element: typeof OcTr): void

name: contextmenuClicked
description: Emitted when a table row has been right-clicked.
type:
(
    e: 'contextmenuClicked',
    element: ComponentPublicInstance<unknown>,
    event: MouseEvent,
    item: Item
  ): void

name: sort
description: Emitted when a column has been sorted.

name: dropRowStyling
description: Emitted when an element has entered a drop zone inside the table.
type: (e: 'dropRowStyling', selector: string, leaving: boolean, event: DragEvent): void

name: itemVisible
description: Emitted when an item has been scrolled into the view.
